thread.title_full: Rough Night Trailer: Scarlett Johansson’s Bachelorette Party Kills a Stripper

author: Max Evry
title: Rough Night Trailer: Scarlett Johansson’s Bachelorette Party Kills a Stripper
text:
SHARE Rough Night Trailer: Scarlett Johansson’s bachelorette party kills a stripper 
The first trailer has been released (via BuzzFeed ) for the upcoming Sony Pictures R-rated comedy Rough Night (formerly known as Rock That Body ). The bridal party includes Scarlett Johansson ( Lucy ), Jillian Bell ( The Night Before ), Ilana Glazer ( Broad City ), Kate McKinnon ( Ghostbusters ) and Zoë Kravitz ( Mad Max: Fury Road ). Check out the Red Band Rough Night trailer below! 
Reminiscent of movies like Very Bad Things and The Hangover , the comedy follows a bachelorette party weekend at a Miami beach house gone wrong when a male stripper ends up dead. The longtime friends have to put their heads together in order to cover up the accident. 
The film co-stars Demi Moore ( Charlie’s Angels: Full Throttle ), Colton Haynes ( Arrow ), Ty Burrell ( Modern Family ) and Dean Winters ( John Wick ). 
Written by Lucia Aniello and Paul W. Downs of Broad City and directed by Aniello, Rough Night is set to open on June 16. 
  first Rough Night trailer? Are you excited to see a largely female cast in a comedy? Let us know in the comments or tweet us @ComingSoonnet !
